column4: Microsoft turns spotlight on cloud  mobile with new reporting style
column5: Microsoft Corp joined Amazon.com Inc and Intel Corp in tweaking the way it reports results  a move that will help the software giant show off its growing cloud and mobile businesses.

column4: Microsoft turns spotlight on cloud  mobile with new reporting style
column5: Sept 29 Microsoft Corp joined Amazon.com Inc and Intel Corp in tweaking the way it reports results  a move that will help the software giant show off its growing cloud and mobile businesses.

column4: China hands Microsoft administrative fine over Xbox venture
column5: BEIJING Microsoft Corp  and its Chinese partner in an Xbox game console venture have been fined by China's commerce ministry for breaching antitrust rules but escaped serious punishment after it deemed they did not hamper free market competition.

column4: China hands Microsoft administrative fine over Xbox venture
column5: BEIJING  Sept 29 Microsoft Corp and its Chinese partner in an Xbox game console venture have been fined by China's commerce ministry for breaching antitrust rules but escaped serious punishment after it deemed they did not hamper free market competition.

column4: Microsoft reorganizes its financial results reporting
column5: Microsoft Corp  said it was changing the way it reported financial results to reflect its emphasis on cloud and mobile businesses.

column4: RPT-Big Auto look to tech companies to fix cars over the air
column5: * Tesla out ahead as traditional carmakers still in first gear

column4: Big Auto look to tech companies to fix cars over the air
column5: SAN FRANCISCO As cars increasingly resemble digital devices  a group of technology firms that can send wireless software updates to cars are in hot demand by carmakers scrambling to catch up to Tesla Motors  in the arena of over-the-air updates  or OTAs.

column4: Big Auto look to tech companies to fix cars over the air
